page.title: 10LEISURE SURVEY
page.content: For this project, Neela and I did a survey in Ickenham. We asked the shoppers six simple questions:- 1) If you want to see a film, where do you go? 2) do you think there should be more entertainment in Ickenham? 3)If so, what? 4)For what age group would you like the entertainment to be aimed at? 5) would you like a disco or youthclub for younger people? We discovered in answer to question one that most people seemed to go to London.Harrow and Rayners Lane were also popular for cinemas. Most people wanted more entertainment in Ickenham,(except for one person).Sports, cinemas, and discos were the most popular requests, with clubs and bingo coming next.
